apps.name: rdzSonde
apps.subtitle: Radiosonde tracking for weather balloons
apps.localizedDescription:
Track and visualize radiosondes (weather balloons) with real-time data from TTGO ESP32 devices. Features offline maps, GPS integration, and automatic device discovery via mDNS/Bonjour.

Key Features:
• Real-time radiosonde tracking
• Offline map support
• GPS location integration
• Automatic TTGO device discovery
• Manual IP connection support
• WGS84 to EGM96 coordinate conversion

privacy.name: LocalNetwork
privacy.usageDescription: Used to discover and connect to TTGO radiosonde receivers on your local network

privacy.name: Location
privacy.usageDescription: Used to display your current location on the map and calculate distances to radiosondes

privacy.name: NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUse
privacy.usageDescription: This app needs location access to track GPS position and share with TTGO devices.
